text: Ej musalmonon, ojo raftori ʙani Isroilro faromūş karded va umedvor hasted, ki jahudijon ʙa dini şumo imon ʙijovarand, hol on ki gurūhe az olimonaşon kalomi Alloh Tavrotro meşunidand va ʙo on ki haqiqati onro mejoftand va qasdan onro dar ma'no jo lafz taƣjir medodand va az kori xeş ogoh ʙudand
